version_control_strategy.philosophy: Semantic Versioning (SemVer). Every change is traceable.

branching_model.main: Production-ready code ONLY. Never commit directly.

types: refactor: (A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature)
perf: (A code change that improves performance)
commit_convention.example: feat(cart): add free shipping progress bar

changelog_automation.action: Generate CHANGELOG.md based on commit types.

saving_protocol.purpose: Automates the entire save process: git add, commit, push, and Google Drive backup.

usage.note: If no commit message is provided, the script will generate one automatically.

saving_protocol.recommendation: Run at the end of each work session to ensure all progress is saved and backed up.
